trans-unit.source: Built-In Desired State Configuration Resources for Linux
trans-unit.target: Recursos Internos de Configuração de Estado Desejado para Linux

trans-unit.source: Resources are building blocks that you can use to write a PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) script.
trans-unit.target: Os recursos são blocos de construção que você pode usar para escrever um script de Configuração de Estado Desejado (DSC) do PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: DSC for Linux comes with a set of built-in functionality for configuring resources such as files and folders, packages, environment variables, and services and processes.
trans-unit.target: A DSC para Linux vem com um conjunto de funcionalidade interna para configurar recursos, como arquivos e pastas, pacotes, variáveis de ambiente, serviços e processos.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides a list of these resources and links to topics that describe them in detail.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir fornece uma lista desses recursos e links para tópicos que os descrevem detalhadamente.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxArchiveResource.md)">nxArchive Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Provides a mechanism to unpack archive (.tar, .zip) files at a specific path.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxArchiveResource.md)">Recurso nxArchive</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> — fornece um mecanismo para descompactar arquivos mortos (.tar, .zip) em um caminho específico.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxEnvironmentResource.md)">nxEnvironment Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages environment variables on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxEnvironmentResource.md)">Recurso nxEnvironment</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> — gerencia as variáveis de ambiente em nós de destino.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileResource.md)">nxFile Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages Linux files and directories.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileResource.md)">Recurso nxFile</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> — gerencia arquivos e diretórios do Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileLineResource.md)">nxFileLine Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages individual lines in a Linux file.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileLineResource.md)">Recurso nxFileLine</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> — gerencia linhas individuais em um arquivo do Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxGroupResource.md)">nxGroup Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages local Linux groups.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxGroupResource.md)">Recurso nxGroup</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> — gerencia grupos locais do Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxPackageResource.md)">nxPackage Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages packages on Linux nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxPackageResource.md)">Recurso nxPackage</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> — gerencia pacotes em nós do Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxScriptResource.md)">nxScript Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Runs scripts on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxScriptResource.md)">Recurso nxScript</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> — executa scripts em nós de destino.
<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxServiceResource.md)">Recurso nxService</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> — gerencia serviços do Linux (daemons).

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)">nxSshAuthorizedKeys Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages public ssh keys for a Linux user.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)">Recurso nxSshAuthorizedKeys</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> — gerencia chaves ssh públicas para um usuário do Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxUserResource.md)">nxUser Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages local Linux users.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxUserResource.md)">Recurso nxUser</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> — gerencia usuários locais do Linux.
